    public class FluidMeterWidget
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.widget.ButtonWidget
    A widget to show the amount of fluid a machine has!

    • Constructor Detail

      • FluidMeterWidget

        public FluidMeterWidget​(int x,
                        int y,
                        net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                        int stackIndex,
                        java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Integer> amount,
                        java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Integer> capacity,
                        java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Integer,net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid> fluid)
        Instantiates a new Fluid meter widget.
        Parameters:
        x - the x location
        y - the y location
        pos - the block position of the entity
        stackIndex - which index of the fluid inventory this is a widget for
        amount - a function giving the amount of fluid to display
        capacity - a function giving the capacity of the tank
        fluid - a function which gives the fluid to render (given a state index)
